scenario_text.value:
This looks like an apartment complex. You can
see people’s laundry and everything.
Yeah, I think you’re right.

I’m just glad there are hardly any enemies
around!

Me, too. At the very least, we can assume
this isn’t their main stronghold.

Guess we have to keep going further west.
Hmm? Professor? Are you okay?

Oh, forgive me. I’m fine. Nothing for you to
worry about.

(Ever since we got here, the Professor has
been acting really weird.)

People are more likely to live here than in
the school. Maybe there’s someone here?
We should look and see.

But I sense hardly any traces of humans
at all.

Well, even if that’s the case, it doesn’t
hurt to check, does it?

There’s probably more food and clothes than
at the school. We could use some supplies.
I...guess you have a point there.

I’m not sure it’s really a good ideal to look
around right now, though.

But we’re out of food. If we don’t stock up,
we’ll be in real trouble.
Yeah, but still...

And again, we might at least find someone.
We can’t rely just rely on these guys.

Hey! What are you trying to say about us?
How rude!

Sounds like it’s settled. In that case, I’ll
take a look around the entrance.
I’ll go check out this building here.
I’ll see what’s around the back entrance.

Sounds good. If you guys find anything,
just yell really loud, okay?

Wait, you guys. It’s too dangerous for us to
separate like this right now.

(Ugh, too late. Everybody’s already broken
off to do their own thing.)

(I get how everyone feels, but this isn’t
good. I have to do something!)

We have to look for Falcomon even if it’s
just the two of us, Agumon.

I agree. I wonder where he went?
I hope he’s okay...
